response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is worth $800,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly contribute to your endeavors or personal satisfaction. Considering its true worth and the potential it holds for you, I am offering you the chance to purchase this item at a special price of $950,000. I understand that such an investment is significant, but I am confident that the benefits it will bring to you justify this offer. If you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the transaction, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
